categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Naritus was an aging MC80a Star Cruiser in the New Republic Defense Fleet that served in the Outer Rim Territories as a pirate hunter.

Under the command of Mon Calamari captain Genkal, the vessel crushed the pirate band Khuiumin Survivors. The Naritus was later the command vessel of a New Republic rescue operation to Thanta Zilbra and the home base of Rogue Squadron, which was based on the vessel during the rescue mission.
Naritus was also the name of a server—or "Galaxy"—in Star Wars Galaxies.
